#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,flag,j;
    long a[19]={2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,16384,32768,65536,131072,262144,524288};
    long n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        flag=0;
        for(j=0;j<19;j++)
        {
            if(n==a[j])
            {
                flag=1;
            }
        }
        if(flag==1)
        {
            printf("BKUL\n");
        }
        else
        {
            printf("BMEENA\n");
        }                
    }    
    system("pause");
    return 0;
}
